name: Heartbeat (CaptainProton42)
description:
Gorb's and my entry for Ludum Dare 46!

Keep the heart alive by clicking on it.

There are two levels (a tutorial level and a regular level). You can choose them from the main menu.

Controls:

  • Click in the circle to keep the heartbeat going and to let the heart jump away from your mouse.
  • Hold the left mouse button to charge a jump.
  • Release left mouse button on time with a heartbeat to make a farther jump.
  • You can aim your jump by postioning your mouse inside the circle, the red dots will indicate the trajectory of a perfect jump.

Don’t stand still and keep the heartbeat going. Get the heart safely to its box!
